alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Keith; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 8:26PM CDT until August 10 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Arthur County in west central Nebraska... Northeastern Keith County in southwestern Nebraska... Southwestern McPherson County in west central Nebraska... * Until 915 PM CDT/815 PM MDT/. * At 824 PM CDT/724 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Lemoyne, or 11 miles southwest of Arthur, moving east-southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Keystone, Big Bald Hill, Nevens, Broganville and McKeag. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 98 and 119. Highway 92 near mile marker 138. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
